post./:Type/:Function: Routing made easy. All params are received by JSON.
post./:Type/Tag/:Function: Perform function on Tag. Tag must be supported.
post./:Type/Page/Tagged/:Amount/:Page: Pages tagged Type, Quantity Amount, page number Page
post./:Type/Tag/Page/:Amount/:Page: Perform function on Tagged Type. Tag must be supported.
post./:Type/Tag/List/:Amount: Perform function on Tag. Tag must be supported.
post./:Type/:Function/Tag: Perform function on Tagged Type. Tag must be supported.

ReceivePayment.purpose: Process payments by taking the id of a token, verifying it is a valid token, then processing a payment of amount amt.

amt.comment: The amount of the payment

description.comment: The reason or description for/of the payment

save.comment: Whether or not the card details should be saved through Stripe for future re-use.

tests: Errors on invalid id
Adds transaction to database
Charges correct amount
Creates charge with Stripe

Rejects good form, invalid tokens (async)

Refund.purpose: Refund a payment to a customer

amount.comment: Amount to refund. -1 means full amount

tests: Refunds correct amount
Ignores bad form for transaction id (local)
Breaks on non-existent transaction id

Adjust.purpose: Adjust a previously made payment (refund, and makepayment, or just a refund if is less)
tests: refunds correct partial amount
re-charges correct amount
refunds full amount on new charge higher

user.comment: The id or User object deleting the customer contact

tests: Undefined if contact or user do not exist
Refuses if user is not the customer that the contact belongs to, or an employee with read/write permissions on customers
Sets contact to deleted

name.comment: The name of the asset to be added

purchaseValue.comment: Represents how much the asset was purchased for

user.comment: The id or User object creating the asset

tests: Undefined if User does not exist
Refuse if user does not have write permission on Assets
Refuse missing required fields
Creates new asset

asset.comment: The id or Asset to retrieve

user.comment: The id or User object requesting the asset

tests: Undefined if user or asset does not exist
Refuses if user does not have read permission on Asset
Returns asset

ListAsset.purpose: Gets a list of assets. Alias for PageAssets(page = 1)

amt.comment: The amount to retrieve

user.comment: The id or User object requesting the asset listing

tests: Undefined if user does not exist
Caps out at 100
Returns list of assets

amt.comment: The amount to retrieve in a page

page.comment: The page number to get (starting point 1)

user.comment: The id or User object requesting the page

tests: Undefined if user does not exist
Caps out at 100
Returns list of assets

asset.comment: The id or Asset object to update

obj.comment: The update object. Supports fields name, desc/description, purchase_value/purchaseValue, serial/serialKey/serial_key

user.comment: The id or User object requesting the update

tests: Undefined if user or asset does not exist
Refuses bad form update object (no valid fields)
Refuses if user does not have read permission on asset
Refuses if user does not have write permission on asset
Updates all fields

SetAssetArchived.purpose: Sets the archived status of an asset

asset.comment: The id or Asset object to set the archived of

user.comment: The id or User object requesting the archival/removal from archive

status.comment: Whether or not the asset is to be archived

tests: Undefined if user or asset does not exist
Refuses if user does not have read permission on assets
Refuses if user does not have write permission on assets
Sets archived to status

ArchiveAsset.purpose: Sets an asset to be archived. Alias for SetAssetArchived (status=true)

asset.comment: The id or Asset object to be archived

user.comment: The id or User object setting the archival

tests: Undefined if user or asset does not exist
Refuses if user does not have read permission on assets
Refuses if user does not have write permission on assets
Sets archived to true

UnarchiveAsset.purpose: Removes an asset from archived. Alias for SetAssetArchived(status=false)

asset.comment: The id or Asset to remove from archive

user.comment: The id or User removing the object from the archive

tests: Undefined if user or asset does not exist
Refuses if user does not have read permission on assets
Refuses if user does not have write permission on assets
Sets archived to false
